question_text: Which of the following is a common feature of multi-output adapters?
answer_options: They combine Ethernet, video, and USB ports into one device
They only work on mobile phones
They split HDMI signals into multiple monitors
correct_answer: They combine Ethernet, video, and USB ports into one device
explanation: Multi-output adapters (e.g., USB-C docks) often offer several ports such as USB, Ethernet, DisplayPort, and HDMI from a single connector.
